member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService
member.summary: Creates, edits and checks in entries. Finds records by parameters.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CreateRecord(System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Char,System.Int16,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Creates a new record from user input.
member.param: The first name entered by the user.
The last name entered by the user.
The date of birth entered by the user.
The gender entered by the user.
The height entered by the user.
The weight entered by the user.
member.returns: Returns the id of the created record.
member.exception: If the firstName or lastName is equal null.

The firstName or lastName length is less than 2 or greater than 60.The dateOfBirth is less than 01-Jun-1950 or greater today's date. The gender isn't equal 'f' or 'm'. The height is less than 0 or greater than 250. The weight is less than 0.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.GetStat
member.summary: Gets the count of all existing records.
member.returns: Returns the count of all existing records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.EditRecord(System.Int32,System.String,System.String,System.DateTime,System.Char,System.Int16,System.Decimal)
member.summary: Edits an already existing entry by id.
member.param: The id of the record to be modified.
The new first name in the record.
The new last name in the record.
The new date of birth in the record.
The new gender in the record.
The new height in the record.
The new weight in the record.
member.exception: if records with the specified ID do not exist.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByFirstName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds all records by first name.
member.param: The parameter by which you want to find all existing records.
member.returns: Returns all records by first name.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByLastName(System.String)
member.summary: Finds all records by last name.
member.param: The parameter by which you want to find all existing records.
member.returns: Returns all records by last name.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.FindByDateOfBirth(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Finds all records by date of birth.
member.param: The parameter by which you want to find all existing records.
member.returns: Returns all records by date of birth.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.IsExist(System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if records with the specified id exists.
member.param: The id entered by the user.
member.returns: True if records exists and false if records don't exist.

member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.Program
member.summary: Works with user input when working with records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.Program.Main(System.String[])
member.summary: Receives a command from the user.
